name: iposcursor
description: Simple implementation of ipadOS 13.4 cursor built in Javascript.

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build:umd && npm run build:less
scripts.build:umd: parcel build -d dist src/index.ts --out-file iposcursor.min.js --global iposcursor
scripts.demo: npm run build && cd example/parcel/ && parcel index.html

author: José Sánchez Aranda
